source: take the bull by the horns
lemma: take the bull by the horns
definitions: To deal with a difficult situation directly and courageously.
To confront a problem head-on without hesitation.
examples: She decided to take the bull by the horns and address the issue.
It's time to take the bull by the horns and make a decision.
He had to take the bull by the horns and tell them the truth.
